name: SixtySecondScience
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A brief podcast under 3 minutes, published roughly daily by Scientific American magazine. Learn about interesting scientific developments quickly every day! 

Here is the feed used: http://rss.sciam.com/sciam/60secsciencepodcast
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
